rationales.conformity: He emphasizes fitting in and not making mistakes with his younger group.
rationales.benevolence: He still drives home to check on his mother after a demanding week.

rationales.conformity: He prioritizes accurate summary, citation, and formal correctness over personal stance.
rationales.self_direction: He suppresses his own viewpoint even when directly invited to provide it.

rationales.conformity: He follows group consensus despite believing the proposal is risky.
rationales.self_direction: He withholds thirty years of relevant judgment instead of asserting it.
rationales.security: His objection centers on system-failure risk and the need for backup records.

rationales.benevolence: He provides extensive practical care after his mother's fall.
rationales.conformity: He avoids escalation with Karen to preserve family peace.
rationales.achievement: Care demands displace his academic preparation and performance readiness.

rationales.self_direction: He begins voicing his own professional perspective as legitimate academic input.
rationales.achievement: He seeks targeted instructor feedback and changes his writing approach.
He produces a strong policy section quickly and earns clear peer validation.
rationales.self_direction: He writes from lived expertise instead of defaulting to detached summary.

rationales.conformity: He chooses the least confrontational path to avoid a likely family blowup.
rationales.benevolence: He continues carrying most day-to-day responsibility for his mother's care.
rationales.self_direction: He describes absorbing conflict instead of asserting his own limits or needs.

rationales.conformity: He historically defaults to going along to prevent others' disappointment.
rationales.self_direction: He gives away ordinary personal choices, reflecting reduced agency.

rationales.achievement: He delivers in a high-pressure presentation and contributes substantively in Q&A.
rationales.self_direction: He gives an original answer from his own experience rather than scripted summary.

rationales.benevolence: He responds immediately to concerns about his mother and tries to arrange added support.
rationales.conformity: He retreats quickly when she resists help to avoid forcing a confrontation.

rationales.achievement: He receives improved academic feedback and helps produce a strong final brief.
rationales.self_direction: He directly challenges Karen instead of defaulting to silent compliance.
rationales.conformity: He intentionally breaks his harmony-preserving pattern and accepts relational friction.
